name: Kennel Dash
description:
Kennel Dash!

Audio has now been fixed! Special thanks to Protec Games for troubleshooting!

Play as an adorable puppy whom is traveling with his family on vacation! Using the power of "Fun", he shoves his kennel forward in an attempt to explore the airport luggage system and get to his plane on time!

Controls: 

  • Fun (Push Forward) - Spacebar / Gamepad Down
  • Reset Player - Hold down "Fun"

Input System for Webgl is considered experimental by Unity, so if it breaks please let me know!

Along the way, the puppy will encounter:

  • Conveyor Belts that move the kennel!
  • Rotating Platforms that move and turn the kennel!
  • TNT (because that would be in an airport luggage system, right!?!?)
  • NEW Luggage of varying weight that can be moved and pushed around!

This was made in about 45-50 hours for One Button Jam and LOWRES Jam! Consider this more a proof-of-concept prototype than a full experience! ;)
